alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:07AM CDT until July 10 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CDT FOR MARSHALL...WESTERN RED LAKE...POLK...WESTERN PENNINGTON...EASTERN GRAND FORKS...NORTHERN TRAILL AND EASTERN WALSH COUNTIES... At 806 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Donaldson to near Key West to near Nielsville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Euclid, Dorothy, Englund, Florian, Wylie, Beltrami, Greenview, Strandquist, St. Hilaire, Red Lake Falls, Fertile and Hazel. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 114 and 181. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
